Module rucafe.ordermanager.cs213project4
Package rucafe.ordermanager

Class Order

java.lang.Object
rucafe.ordermanager.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order containing multiple menu items.
Author:
Aravind Chendu, Woogyeom Sim
